name: A Good Day to Die
description:
A Good Day to Die is a singleplayer action packed dungeon  crawler.

Will you survive the challenges ahead? Are you ready to roll the dice and toss yourself into chaotic arms of chance? Brace yourself, because this is A Good Day to Die.

  • Toss your head around, roll out!
  • Find new powers and upgrade your dice! Master them all to master the dungeon.
  • Equip yourself with amazingly creative items like: Cloak with Eyes, Slightly Lighter Hat, Skeleton Jesus Savior and Severed "Hand"!
  • Thwart Princess Die-ana's plan and reclaim your head!

We've developed this game for Windows with a keyboard+mouse setup. For detailed information about the controls there is a ReadMe in the root folder of the build.
